name: chunkundo.nvim
description: Undo incrementally even in long edit sessions. Neovim plugin powered by chillout.nvim's debounce/throttle/batch.

features.title: Time-based Chunking
features.description: Detect typing pauses and split undo units automatically. No more losing everything.

features.title: Auto-adjust
features.description: Learns your typing pattern and adjusts interval automatically.

features.title: chillout.nvim Integration
features.description: Built on debounce/throttle/batch library. Useful for plugin development too.
